sentences.sentence: Perhaps this can partly explain the existence of left-handers in human societies.
sentences.translation: 也许这可以部分解释人类社会中左撇子的存在。

sentences.sentence: Research shows mixed-handers can remember everyday things better than other people.
sentences.translation: 研究表明双手并用者比其他人更擅长记住日常事情。

sentences.sentence: Mr. Gruby being left-handed himself, thought of the idea to try to promote a few products for left-handers.
sentences.translation: 格鲁比先生自己也是左撇子，他想到了这个主意，试图推广一些为左撇子设计的产品。
